title: Rep. Riggleman Considering Run for VA Gov
itunes:title: Rep. Riggleman Considering Run for VA Gov
description:
Rep. Denver Riggleman, a Republican representing Virgina's 5th congressional district told Bloomberg's Kevin Cirilli he is seriously considering a run for Virginia governor. They also discussed efforts by lawmakers to reach a deal on a stimulus package and his efforts to honor Purple Star Families. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
